DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to assess the pharmacokinetics of atazanavir, identifying one or more dosing regimens of atazanavir/ritonavir/tenofovir when dosed with famotidine results in atazanavir exposures similar to those when atazanavir/ritonavir/tenofovir 300/100/300 mg is dosed without famotidine in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study With Famotidine, Atazanavir, and Atazanavir/Ritonavir/Tenofovir
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and female subjects between the ages 18 to 50 years old with a BMI 18 to 32 kg/m2
